name: io.github.iamsamuelfraga/mcp-pipedrive
description: Complete Pipedrive CRM integration with 254 MCP tools for deals, contacts, and pipelines

PIPEDRIVE_API_TOKEN.description: Your Pipedrive API token (found in Settings → Personal Preferences → API)

PIPEDRIVE_COMPANY_DOMAIN.description: Your Pipedrive company domain (e.g., 'mycompany' if your URL is mycompany.pipedrive.com)

PIPEDRIVE_TOOLSETS.description: Comma-separated list of toolsets to enable (e.g., 'deals,persons,organizations'). Leave empty to enable all toolsets.

PIPEDRIVE_READ_ONLY.description: Set to 'true' to enable read-only mode (blocks all write operations)

features: 254 MCP tools covering all major Pipedrive entities
Full CRUD operations for deals, persons, organizations, activities
TypeScript support with full type definitions
